title: ICE -Zsave-analysis issue-3763.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-save-analysis
labels.description: Area: saving results of analyses such as inference and borrowck results to a file.

body:
### Code ```rust mod my_mod { pub struct MyStruct { priv_field: isize } pub fn MyStruct () -> MyStruct { MyStruct {priv_field: 4} } impl MyStruct { fn happyfun(&self) {} } } fn main() { let my_struct = my_mod::MyStruct(); let _woohoo = (&my_struct).priv_field; //~^ ERROR field `priv_field` of struct `my_mod::MyStruct` is private let _woohoo = (Box::new(my_struct)).priv_field; //~^ ERROR field `priv_field` of struct `my_mod::MyStruct` is private (&my_struct).happyfun(); //~ ERROR method `happyfun` is private (Box::new(my_struct)).happyfun(); //~ ERROR method `happyfun` is private let nope = my_struct.priv_field; //~^ ERROR field `priv_field` of struct `my_mod::MyStruct` is private } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.43.0-nightly (436494b8f 2020-02-22) binary: rustc commit-hash: 436494b8f8008b600d64b3951f63c2bb0ea81673 commit-date: 2020-02-22 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.43.0-nightly LLVM version: 9.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0616]: field `priv_field` of struct `my_mod::MyStruct` is private --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-3763.rs:15:19 | 15 | let _woohoo = (&my_struct).priv_field; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ error[E0616]: field `priv_field` of struct `my_mod::MyStruct` is private --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-3763.rs:18:19 | 18 | let _woohoo = (Box::new(my_struct)).priv_field; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ error[E0624]: method `happyfun` is private --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-3763.rs:21:18 | 21 | (&my_struct).happyfun(); //~ ERROR method `happyfun` is private | ^^^^^^^^ error[E0624]: method `happyfun` is private --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-3763.rs:23:27 | 23 | (Box::new(my_struct)).happyfun(); //~ ERROR method `happyfun` is private | ^^^^^^^^ error[E0616]: field `priv_field` of struct `my_mod::MyStruct` is private --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-3763.rs:24:16 | 24 | let nope = my_struct.priv_field; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/librustc_save_analysis/lib.rs:535:37 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports note: rustc 1.43.0-nightly (436494b8f 2020-02-22) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -Z save-analysis error: aborting due to 5 previous errors Some errors have detailed explanations: E0616, E0624. For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0616`. ```
Backtrace

error[E0616]: field `priv_field` of struct `my_mod::MyStruct` is private --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-3763.rs:18:19 | 18 | let _woohoo = (Box::new(my_struct)).priv_field; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ error[E0624]: method `happyfun` is private --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-3763.rs:21:18 | 21 | (&my_struct).happyfun(); //~ ERROR method `happyfun` is private | ^^^^^^^^ error[E0624]: method `happyfun` is private --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-3763.rs:23:27 | 23 | (Box::new(my_struct)).happyfun(); //~ ERROR method `happyfun` is private | ^^^^^^^^ error[E0616]: field `priv_field` of struct `my_mod::MyStruct` is private --> src/test/ui/issues/issue-3763.rs:24:16 | 24 | let nope = my_struct.priv_field; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/librustc_save_analysis/lib.rs:535:37 stack backtrace: 0: backtrace::backtrace::libunwind::trace at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:59 4: core::fmt::write at src/libcore/fmt/mod.rs:1052 5: std::io::Write::write_fmt at src/libstd/io/mod.rs:1428 6: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:62 7: std::sys_common::backtrace::print at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:49 8: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}} at src/libstd/panicking.rs:204 9: For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0616`. ```
